TextLibrary.Text: Drong
Mmph... Ice Troll not so good. Cold and stringy. Drong feel sick. Drong needs a Wyvern.

Mmph... Ice Troll not so good. Cold and stringy. Drong feel sick. Drong needs a Wyvern.
A Wyvern? There are plenty of those around here.
A Wyvern? There are plenty of those around here.
A Wyvern? There are plenty of those around here.

Drong know that. They settle his stomach. Drong thinks Ice Troll is regenerating in there. Need something poisonous to wash it down.

Okay...
Okay...
Okay...
Okay...
You find Wyvern in Wyverns' Roost not far from here. If you hurry, Drong have magic stone for you.

That should go nicely with the magic hat and magic stick you gave me. I'll be right back.
